pullrequest.title: [Suggestion] Return positive infinity instead of -1 for boundless positive values

content.raw:
> If we want to officially support users putting “+/-inf” into their SDF documents and add it to the specification, then I could write some tests to make sure we’re parsing “inf” correctly and then add it to the documentation.

This sounds good to me. This makes more sense than interpreting negative numbers as inf. Are you able to add these tests?
